title: Poll: Did you reattain your rank from the previous season?
body: Just wondering how many of you managed to get back to your rank from the previous season.

replies.body: Managed to climb to diamond. was p2 last season but i don't know how long ill stay or if ill get any higher :/

I never got demoted.
went 6-4 or 7-3 and stayed at same rank.

Trust me I'm confused.

I just got back there!

Finished the season at Diamond 1, got back in ~33 wins :D
Super happy about it, hopefully the next step is up!

I kinda want to try to get into bronze this season but then again I don't like feeding in ranked or not playing at my best.

 I've only done my placements in flex queue (but queued solo because I'm bad and I don't want to drag any of my friends down to silver) but I plan on doing soloq placements soon. Wow though 100 games is alot of ranked games to have completed given we're only a month into this seasons ranked.
Flex 5:5 Rank: Bronze 4 12 LP (27W 31L - 47% winratio) . Last season Silver 5 in dynamic queue. So nope, but not 100 games played yet.
Bronze was pretty easy to meet :) Except in season one. (Didn't meet it). Game still pretty good though.
I mean i haven't played normal ranked again yet, because school holidays are terrible for league.
